usage: Used for strength training, toning, and resistance exercises at home, in fitness classes, or in a personal workout area.
key_features: Pair of 1 KG dumbbells for a total of 2 KG weight
Cast iron core with neoprene coating for durability and safety
Anti-slip neoprene surface for a secure, comfortable grip
Printed weight number on each end cap for easy identification
Color-coded pink design to quickly recognize weight
Hexagonal shape prevents dumbbells from rolling away
Suitable for home gym, fitness classes, and resistance training
Non-toxic guarantee badge shown for added peace of mind
ai_description: Pair of pink KAKSS 1 KG neoprene dumbbells with clear weight markings and hexagonal, non-roll design. The non-slip, non-toxic coated surface offers a secure grip for home workouts, fitness classes, and light strength training.
target_audience: Home exercisers, beginners, and fitness enthusiasts looking for light hand weights for workouts, toning, and group fitness classes.
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells 1+1=2 KG Pack of 1 KG Each, Anti-Slip Coated Hand Weights for Home Gym & Fitness Training - Pink
